verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: wants] [ARG1: United Airlines , American Airlines , and Delta Air Lines to ignore " Orwellian " demands from Beijing on changing the description of Taiwan from a country to a province of China] . The White House has been strengthening ties with Taiwan .
